form.title: Apply for Job
form.transport: Do you have reliable transportation to get to work daily?
form.documents: Do you have documentation to work legally in the United States?
form.experienceDetails: Tell us about your work experience
form.experienceDetailsHelper: Where did you work before? What did you do?
form.experienceDetailsPlaceholder: Example: I worked at a hotel as Housekeeping for 2 years...
form.workExperience: What other work experience do you have?
form.experienceLocationTitle: Where and when did you have this experience?
form.experienceLocationHelper: Tell us about the place and time period you worked
form.experienceLocationPlaceholder: Example: Marriott Hotel in Orlando, FL
form.additionalNotesHelper: Anything else you want to tell us? (Optional)
form.additionalNotesPlaceholder: Write here any additional information you consider relevant...
form.successMessage: Your application has been sent successfully. We will contact you soon.
form.errorMessage: Could not send application. Please try again.
